name: Letters from Camp Arcadia
description:
At the historic Camp Arcadia in scenic upstate New York, head counselor Bartleby Thatch has come to you, his various staff, counselors, teachers and everything else, for an assignment. He wants you to record a broadcast, a little slice of life installment of the day to day goings on of this quaint little camp.

Take turns drawing cards to expand the scope and scale of the camp, and slowly unveil the strange occult and eldritch horror that occurs there through collaboration and improvisation with your fellow staff members
